changeSet.author: maxim
changeSet.sql:
create table parent_post( id integer not null primary key ); ;;
create table wp_post( id integer not null primary key, post_author integer, post_date timestamp without time zone, post_content text, post_status varchar(20), post_title text, post_name varchar(200), post_type varchar(100), parent_post integer references parent_post(id), language_code varchar(10) ); ;;
